string.name: SID_EMOTICON_CMD_ERROR_SPACE
string.value: Spaces cannot be used.

string.name: SID_EMOTICON_CMD_ERROR_SLASH
string.value: The '/' character cannot be used.

string.name: SID_EMOTICON_CMD_ERROR_SYSTEM_CMD
string.value: %s is a command scheduled by the system.

string.name: SID_EMOTICON_CMD_ERROR_CURSE
string.value: Profanity cannot be used.

string.name: SID_MESSENGER_NORAML_MODE_EMOTICON
string.value: "Emoticon: %s"

string.name: SID_EMOTICON_SEND_ERROR_FIELD
string.value: Chat emoticons can't be used in this map.

string.name: SID_EMOTICON_REMOVE_ERROR_DEFAULT
string.value: Default chat emoticons cannot be removed.

string.name: SID_EMOTICON_GROUP_FAVORITE
string.value: View emoticons you've set as Favorites. \r\nAdd an emoticon to your Favorites by pressing Change.

string.name: SID_EMOTICON_SEND_ERROR_BLOCK
string.value: Chat emoticons can't be used right now.

string.name: SID_CHAT_BUTTON_EMOTICON
string.value: Chat Emoticon

string.name: SID_EMOTICON_SEND_ERROR_FRIEND
string.value: Chat emoticons cannot be used in friend chat.

string.name: SID_EMOTICON_SEND_ERROR_FRIEND_GROUP
string.value: Chat emoticons cannot be used in group chat.

string.name: SID_EMOTICON_SEND_ERROR_GUILD
string.value: Chat emoticons cannot be used in guild chat.

string.name: SID_EMOTICON_SEND_ERROR_ALLIANCE
string.value: Chat emoticons cannot be used in alliance chat.

string.name: SID_EMOTICON_SEND_ERROR_WHISPER
string.value: Chat emoticons cannot be used in whispers.

string.name: SID_EMOTICON_GROUP_PAGE_TOOLTIP
string.value: Use the left and right arrow keys or the mouse wheel \r\nto change pages.

string.name: SID_EMOTICON_EDIT_MODE_TOOLTIP
string.value: Delete or change the order of chat emoticon groups. \r\nSet the order of your Favorites list, or add/remove emoticons from the list.

string.name: SID_TOOLTIP_GUILD_MASTER_TIMEOUT
string.value: Since the Guild Leader has not logged in for a long time, you can force-change the Guild Leader at the Guild Base <Hall of Heroes>.

string.name: SID_ADD_BLACKLIST_NICKNAME
string.value: Enter a name to add to the blacklist.

string.name: SID_ADD_BLACKLIST_USERNAME
string.value: Enter a character name.

string.name: SID_ADD_BLACKLIST_USERALREADYBLACKLIST
string.value: %s already has their %s%s registered.

string.name: SID_ADD_BLACKLIST_NICKALREADYUSE
string.value: %s%s is already being used.

string.name: SID_ADD_BLACKLIST_NICKANME_SPACE
string.value: Names cannot contain spaces.

string.name: SID_ADD_BLACKLIST_NICKNAME_CURSE
string.value: Names cannot contain profanity.

string.name: SID_ADD_FRIEND_ERROR_CURSE
string.value: Profanity can't be used in nicknames or memos.

string.name: SID_CASHTRADING_MSG_BLOCK_TRADE_BOXRESULT
string.value: \r\n#The reward from the box cannot be traded with others.#

string.name: SID_NOTICE_OFFLINEMODE
string.value: In the event of server maintenance, your recent login date may be\r\nvisible in the Buddy and Guild UI, even when using Invisible Login.

string.name: SID_FARM_WHISPER_BLOCKED
string.value: is not someone you can Message.

string.name: SID_ACCOUNT_FRIEND_TRANSFORM
string.value: This is a request to switch friend status to "Account Friend."

string.name: SID_FARM_SEND_PACKET_ERROR
string.value: Please try again later.

string.name: SID_MANNEQUIN_EXCHANGE_DRESSUP_BEFOR
string.value: #b#e[Dress-Up Mode]#n\n%s#r%s#k

string.name: SID_MQTYPE_SELECT_EX
string.value: #e- Enter '%s':#n Stores mannequin in the %s space.\n

string.name: SID_MANNEQUIN_SELECT_FAILED
string.value: Because you didn't enter the correct Beauty Room name,\nthe mannequin use was canceled.

string.name: SID_MANNEQUIN_HAIR_UNUSED_NAMETAG
string.value: %s can be saved.

string.name: SID_MANNEQUIN_EMPTY_NAMETAG
string.value: Mannequin can be stored.

string.name: SID_MQ_TOOLTIP_OVERMAX
string.value: You can't expand any more slots.

string.name: SID_MANNEQUIN_EXCHANGE_MSG
string.value: The mannequin's %s\nand your character's %s have been swapped.

string.name: SID_BEAUTY_CHOICE_COLOR_LENS
string.value: Select the eye color you want from the following:\n(When you click the confirmation button, your character's eye color\nwill be changed to the color you selected.)

string.name: SID_BEAUTY_RESULT_COLOR_LENS
string.value: The eye color has been changed as you selected.

string.name: SID_BEAUTY_ANDROID_CHOICE_COLOR_LENS
string.value: Select an eye color\nthat suits your android.\n(One-Time Cosmetic Lens items will be used in the order that they are stored in your inventory.)

string.name: SID_BEAUTY_CASH_SHOP_COLOR_LENS
string.value: You can change the eye color to any of the following:

string.name: SID_BEAUTY_ROOM_SLOT_COUNT_TOOLTIP
string.value: <Slot Expansion Status>\nCurrently Expanded Slots / Max Expandable Slots

string.name: SID_MONSTER_LIFE_INC_POINT_ERROR_MAXPOINT
string.value: You cannot harvest more Waru than the maximum.

string.name: SID_MONSTER_LIFE_DELETE_OBJECT_ERROR_MAXPOINT
string.value: You have Waru left to harvest, so you cannot relocate the building at this time.

string.name: SID_FLAG_RACE_CANNOT_JOIN_TIMEOUT
string.value: No further participants can join the Flag Race at this time.

string.name: SID_UI_AWAKE_TRAIN_PROGRESS
string.value: %s Training ( %d / %d )

string.name: SID_MANNEQUIN_DELETE_INPUT_FAILED
string.value: Because you didn't enter the correct input,\nthe removal from the mannequin was canceled.

string.name: SID_MANNEQUIN_DELETE_ASK
string.value:
#rRemove %s: %s#k
If you'd like to delete the #b%s#k that's saved on the mannequin, please enter #b%s#k on the below entry window.

string.name: SID_MANNEQUIN_HAIR_SAVE_QUESTION_EX
string.value:
#r#e#fs15#[Caution] This 'hair' hasn't been saved on a mannequin.#n#fs12# 
#kIf you continue, your #rcurrent %s character's hair will #edisappear.#n
%s #fs12##n#b
If you'd still like to use '%s'#k x1 to change the hair of %s, please enter #b#e%s#n#k on the box below.

string.name: SID_MANNEQUIN_FACE_SAVE_QUESTION_EX
string.value:
#r#e#fs15#[Caution] This 'face' hasn't been saved on a mannequin.#n#fs12# 
#kIf you continue, your #rcurrent %s character's face will #edisappear.#n
%s #fs12##n#b
If you'd still like to use '%s'#k x1 to change the face of %s, please enter #b#e%s#n#k on the box below.

string.name: SID_MANNEQUIN_SAVE_QUESTION_EX_FAILED
string.value: You didn't enter 'Change,'\nso the item use was canceled.

string.name: SID_MANNEQUIN_SKIN_SAVE_QUESTION_EX
string.value:
#r#e#fs15#[Caution] This 'skin' hasn't been saved on a mannequin.#n#fs12# 
#kIf you continue, your #rcurrent %s character's skin will #edisappear.#n
%s #fs12##n#b
If you'd still like to use '%s'#k x1 to change the skin of %s, please enter #e#b%s#k#n on the below box.
